item.title: Pennsylvania man charged with threatening Trump, ICE agents, other officials
item.description: A Pennsylvania man has been charged with threatening to assassinate President Trump as well as other officials and ICE agents.

item.title: Democrat Massachusetts lawmaker arrested for fraud, used stolen funds to purchase 'psychic services': feds
